reviewText: More footage of fish being caught than information on tactics. Very little information on tactics.
Great Present for the guy who likes to fish catfish and wants to know the tactics.

This DVD in my opinion is great. First off this DVD highlights streams which not everyone would think would hold catfish. The chumming or speed fishing technique used is great and can help you have a phenomenal fishing trip. They also show bait systems and of course you get to watch big fish being pulled out of the water. This DVD was not meant to be in in-depth video but more of a "think about this or that" DVD. I really enjoyed this one and feel it is worth checking out for anybody wanting to learn more about cat fishing. Plus you get to see ice fishing for catfish.
This video was a waste of money.  They should rename this DVD, "Watch Me Catch Fish."  I would not waste your money on this video.
